articles.title: "Horses For Courses": Ravi Shastri's Significant Advice For India For WTC Final - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Ravi Shastri said that team composition can be key to India's success in the World Test Championship final against Australia.
articles.content: Former Indian cricket team head coach Ravi Shastri believes that the team composition for India can be extremely helpful in the World Test Championship (WTC) final at the Oval and the presence of thr… [+1400 chars]
